attr.title: Garden Story
attr.desc: Embark on a wholesome adventure to save The Grove! Forage resources, combat the invasive Rot, and restore the community. Relax and enjoy the fruits of your labor in this charming action-RPG starring a grape.
attr.inst: Install port. Purchase and download the game on Steam or Epic games. Copy all gamefiles to 'roms/ports/gardenstory/assets' folder.
